slide1.title: Build your e-commerce quick
slide1.description: Build your e-commerce using innovative technologies.
slide2.title: Manage your store
slide2.description: Use Jeeshop-Admin, a light and responsive rich BackOffice client application to manage your store, everywhere !
slide3.title: Contribute to Jeeshop development !
slide3.description: Jeeshop is an open-source Apache V2 licensed project hosted on GitHub. Contribute to its development or adapt it to suit your needs!
